about_the_game:
This DLC contains bonus tracks for Varenje

Files will be placed in your Varenje game folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Varenje\OST2

Tracklist
  • Aquadact
  • Autumn
  • Crystal
  • Evening
  • Fluff
  • game ini
  • Indian
  • Mount
  • Neverland
  • Volkolak
detailed_description:
This DLC contains bonus tracks for Varenje

Files will be placed in your Varenje game folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Varenje\OST2

Tracklist

  • Autumn

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7, 10.8, 10.9, 10.10
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

name: Varenje Soundtrack Vol.2 - Sandwich Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: AMD Atholon 64 X2 Dual-Core 4000+ or better / Intel Core 2 Duo Processor 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI X1800 or better / nVidia 7800 or better / Intel 4100 or better. 512MB Video RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: This DLC contains bonus tracks for Varenje
supported_languages:
